board.name: FlashForge Creator Pro & X with ATmega 2560

firmware.name: Sailfish 7.7 (r1592)
firmware.description: Sailfish Firmware 7.7 (r1592). This firmware is for Creator X units shipped from FlashForge with an ATmega2560. If you installed your own ATmega2560, you do not want to use this build as it expects a different HBP. Requires ReplicatorG 40r28-Sailfish or later in order to connect via USB.

firmware.name: Sailfish 7.6 (r1296)
firmware.description: Sailfish Firmware 7.6 (r1296). This firmware is for Creator X units shipped from FlashForge with an ATmega2560. If you installed your own ATmega2560, you do not want to use this build as it expects a different HBP. Requires ReplicatorG 40r23-Sailfish or later in order to connect via USB.

firmware.name: Sailfish 7.7 (r1416b)
firmware.description: Sailfish Firmware 7.7 (r1416b). This firmware is for Creator X units shipped from FlashForge with an ATmega2560 but with malfunctioning SD card hardware. If you installed your own ATmega2560, you do not want to use this build as it expects a different HBP. Requires ReplicatorG 40r28-Sailfish or later in order to connect via USB.

firmware.name: Sailfish Core-XY 7.7 (r1465)
firmware.description: Sailfish Core-XY Firmware 7.7 (r1465). **Assumes the bot has a power supply capable of running all heaters concurrently with stepper motors at operating currents.** Requires ReplicatorG 40r28-Sailfish or later in order to connect via USB.
